title: Bug 124599 - Shortcut delete and menu delete act different in table column.
description:
Description: Shortcut delete and menu delete act different in table column.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Open attached file in bug 124598. In the file, the second table has a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row. 2. Select the second column. 3. Press delete on your keyboard.
OB: When using the shortcut delete key or the menu delete option in the table column, the actions have different effects.
EB: The shortcut delete key and the menu delete option should have the same effect in the table column.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the attached file in bug 124598. 
2. In the file, locate the second table which has a list/grid nested in its group header and a merge in the group header row. 
3. Select the second column.
4. Press the delete key on your keyboard.
